product_name: BIC Sport Stand Up Paddleboard Coiled Leash - Flatwater
long_description: Maintaining a connection to your board by wrapping around your knee, the Bic Sport Stand Up Paddleboard Coiled Leash an essential piece of stand up paddleboarding gear.
